item.title: TX-18 South/TX-115 West at TX-18
item.description: TX-18 South/TX-115 West at TX-18/TX-115 Split. Turn left for TX-18 south to Monahans; continue straight for TX-115 east to Andrews.

item.title: TX-18 South at TX-115
item.description: TX-18 south at TX-115. Turn left for TX-18 South/TX-115 East; turn right for TX-115 West.

item.title: TX-18 South at TX-115
item.description: TX-18 south at TX-115. Turn right on TX-115 west for Wink; left on TX-115 west/TX-18 south for Monahans. TX-18 joins TX-115 for a few blocks through Kermit.

item.title: TX-18 South Approaching TX-115
item.description: TX-18 south approaching TX-115. Turn left to continue south on TX-18.

item.title: TX-18 South Approaching TX-115
item.description: TX-18 south approaching TX-115 in Kermit.
